title: What did you think of Stray Kids announcing 'In 生'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m extremely excited and my hopes are very high because Stray Kids never disappoint me. Every song and album they produce radiates a vibe; a vibe that only the Stray Kids can radiate. You can tell that they put in their absolute best in every lyric and beat. I love the hairstyles (not Chan’s because he slightly resembles Ronald McDonald, whom I’m not too fond of) and the trailer; without a doubt, they’ve surpassed my expectations once again. I really hope they’re not overworking themselves as they’re planning so many comebacks in a year (Blackpink can’t relate, fuck you YG). STAYs, because Stray Kids are working so hard to spoil us with content, let’s also try our best to stream and vote for them! While you’re here, stream God’s Menu:
Absolutely Excited! This is going to be THE comeback! So everyone, tell your friends to stan SKZ now!!!
